item.title: 4 Bedroom Terrace at Whitesand Homes
item.dc:creator: Kolapo Imam
item.description: The post 4 Bedroom Terrace at Whitesand Homes appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.
item.content:encoded:
4 Bedroom Terrace at Whitesand Homes

PROPERTY DETAIL

Whitesand Homes is located off Whitesands Street, 3rd roundabout, Lekki. It is directly behind Whitesands Schools, few minutes from Nike Art Gallery and Eleguishi Private beach which is located towards the south of the development.

Whitesand Home is the latest addition to the serene Lekki axis with lush greenry streetscape within a residential environment. The property is ideal for new/growing family seeking an affordable entry into the property market, with a guaranteed value appreciation due to the location and demand advantages.

Property Features

  • Industrial Water Plant System
  • Ceiling height windows
  • Fully fitted kitchen
  • Air Conditioned rooms/spaces
  • Private garden with a communal swimming pool
  • 2 parking spaces per unit.
  • Security
  • Central power
  • Water treatment plant and storage

Neighbourhood

  • Whitesands Schools
  • Nike Art Gallery
  • Elegushi Private Beach
  • Meadow Hall
  • Alma Beach Estates
  • Lekki Gardens Estate
  • Regal Seaview Estate

Payment Plan

4 Bedroom Terrace with Maid Room
₦80,000,000 (Outright Payment)

Installment Plan

30% Down Payment = ₦24,000,000
Monthly payment = ₦9,333,333.33
25% Down Payment = ₦20,000,000
Monthly repayment = ₦10,000,000

Completion Date: Quarter 3, 2019

BOOK INSPECTION

The post 4 Bedroom Terrace at Whitesand Homes appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.

item.title: Commercial Property at Beechwood Estate
item.dc:creator: Kolapo Imam
item.description: The post Commercial Property at Beechwood Estate appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.
item.content:encoded:
Commercial Property at Beechwood Estate

PROJECT DETAIL

Beechwood Estate is a self-sustaining new town that integrates residential and business community in one artistic layout. A high-quality urban environment providing basic infrastructure including new roads and drainage, power supply and distribution, water supply system and an opportunity to acquire plots of unencumbered land in an exclusive part of the Lekki Peninsula.

Beechwood is located on KM 36, Lekki-Epe Expressway and sits on a 100-hectare area designed as an integrated residential and commercial community. The property is suitable for School, event center, hospital, warehouse, hotel, block of shops, etc

Estate Features

  • C of O
  • Good accessibility
  • Good road network and drainage
  • The land is facing the lekki Epe Expressway
  • Dry and
  • Secured Estate

Neighbourhood

  • Lakowe Golf Course
  • Lagos Business School
  • Townville Estate
  • RPD Estate by Mix Africa
  • Greenspring Schools
  • Dangote Refinery
  • Lekki Free Trade Zone
  • Pan Atlantic University
  • Coscharis Motors

BOOK INSPECTION

The post Commercial Property at Beechwood Estate appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.

item.title: 4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex at Atican Beachview Estate
item.dc:creator: Kolapo Imam
item.description: The post 4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex at Atican Beachview Estate appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.
item.content:encoded:
4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex with BQ

PROPERTY DETAIL

An Elegantly designed 4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex with BQ by Atican Beach Okun Ajah Lagos.

This duplex is beautifully finished with exquisite materials and it features Industrial Water Plant System, Ensuite rooms with Jacuzzi, Large masters bedroom, Connection to National Grid(Electricity), Green Areas(Garden & Playground), Recreational Area, Security House and lots more.

Property Features

  • Industrial Water Plant System
  • Ensuite rooms with Jacuzzi
  • Quality Italian tiles and railings.
  • Quality roof sheet and design.
  • Solar Powered Street Light.
  • Large masters bedroom
  • Tarred and Paved Roads
  • Connection to National Grid(Electricity)
  • Green Areas(Garden & Playground).
  • Recreational Area
  • Security House

Payment Plan

4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex with BQ
N 45,000,000 (Outright Plan)

Installment Plan
N 45,500,000 (0-6 months)
N 46,000,000 (0-12 months)
N 46,500,000 (12-18 months)
N 47,000,000 (18-24 months)

BOOK INSPECTION

The post 4 Bedroom Semi Detached Duplex at Atican Beachview Estate appeared first on Sellerrand Realty Limited.
